item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1456355408550{margin-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Our History" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="30px"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]

We started as a simple activist group but have since grown into a full-fledged non-for-profit that is capable of taking on the biggest challenges we face environmentally. Here's a quick look at how we got to where we are today.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1456355415446{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="70"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]1990 Our first set of members got together in a garage to plan community sustainability awareness events and a local recycling group. 2002 We officially organized into a nonprofit. This was a big step for us since it finally enabled us to fully apply 100% of donated funds to our cause. 2010 Our first satellite office opened overseas and we became a true global organization. 2016 This year we are expanding to include third party organizations in our network, as well as adding office in 10 more countries putting us on (almost) every continent, leaving us a goal to reach Antartica by 2017.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1456350084138{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f3f1eb !important;border-top-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Our Mission" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="30px"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]

We have plenty of causes, missions and #goals we hope to achieve. Watch the video to learn more.

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_video link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jE-1I5o217A"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1456350312428{margin-top: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Get Involved" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="30px"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]

Now that you know about us, we want to get to know you. Find out how you can get involved with our work today!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1456352279468{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" alignment="center" heading="Join A Cause" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" heading_size="21px" image="65" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/sustainable/events/" css=".vc_custom_1456352355108{border-top-width: 2px !important;border-right-width: 2px !important;border-bottom-width: 2px !important;border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" classes="equal-height-content"]We're involved with everything eco and environmentally conscious. Visit our events calendar to see what's coming up, or let us know of any other events we should add.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" alignment="center" heading="Volunteer" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" heading_size="21px" image="66" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/sustainable/contact/" css=".vc_custom_1456352361340{border-top-width: 2px !important;border-right-width: 2px !important;border-bottom-width: 2px !important;border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" classes="equal-height-content"]With so many great causes to support we have a lot of office work to boot. If you wan to help with mailers, cold calling, event organization and more join our office team.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" alignment="center" heading="Make A Donation" heading_type="h2" url_target="_blank" heading_size="21px" image="67" url="http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/sustainable/donate/" css=".vc_custom_1456352110189{border-top-width: 2px !important;border-right-width: 2px !important;border-bottom-width: 2px !important;border-left-width: 2px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;border-left-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e2d6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 15px !important;}" classes="equal-height-content"]If you're as passionate about the earth as we are but you don't have the time to attend one of our events you can still make a difference with a monetary donation.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row column_spacing="50" css=".vc_custom_1456518640632{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_heading text="The Office" font_size="30px"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]Feel free to stop by any time! Our office doors are open 10am-6pm, Monday through Saturday (except holidays).[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vc_gmaps link="#E-8_"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vcex_heading text="Send Us A Message" font_size="30px"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vcex_form_shortcode full_width="true"][contact-form-7 id="19" title="Sustainable Contact Page"][/vcex_form_shortcode][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: See What We've Been Up To

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded: [vc_row parallax="content-moving-fade" parallax_image="15" center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1456104694294{padding-top: 220px !important;padding-bottom: 180px !important;background-color: #1a100d !important;}"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Help Us Make This World A Better Place." text_align="center" font_size="42px" color="#ffffff"][vcex_heading text="Even the small things make a difference!" text_align="center" font_size="24px" color="#ffffff" font_family="Droid Serif"][vcex_spacing][vcex_button url="http://themeforest.net/item/total-responsive-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/6339019?ref=WPExplorer" title="Get Started" align="center" font_size="18px" custom_background="#9cc900" custom_hover_background="#9cc900"]Get Started[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1456098257818{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Renewable Energy" icon_type="typicons" heading_size="21px" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-flash-outline" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_background="#f6bb42" icon_size="36px" icon_border_radius="50%" icon_width="80px" icon_height="80px"]We focus on providing cities with renewable energy not only to help conserve money but also to help protect out environment.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Clean Water" icon_type="typicons" heading_size="21px" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-coffee" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_background="#3bafda" icon_size="36px" icon_border_radius="50%" icon_width="80px" icon_height="80px"]Not everyone is lucky enough to have access to clean water. We help provide clean water to the less fortunate in a sustainable way.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Eco-Friendly" icon_type="typicons" heading_size="21px" icon_typicons="typcn typcn-leaf" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_background="#8cc152" icon_size="34px" icon_border_radius="50%" icon_width="80px" icon_height="80px"]All of our offices are Eco-Friendly and use only solar energy and recycled water. We want to share our technology with others.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax="content-moving-fade" center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1456098136768{padding-top: 140px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background: #000000 url(http://totaltheme.wpengine.com/sustainable/wp-content/uploads/sites/67/2016/02/forest.jpg?id=17);background-position:center;background-repeat:-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4"][vcex_milestone speed="500" number="1" caption="Planet Earth" number_color="#ffffff" caption_color="#ffffff"][vcex_spacing][vcex_icon icon="fa fa-globe" float="center" color="#ffffff" custom_size="52px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vcex_milestone number="460" caption="Wildlife Protected" number_color="#ffffff" caption_color="#ffffff"][vcex_spacing][vcex_icon icon="fa fa-leaf" float="center" color="#ffffff" custom_size="52px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vcex_milestone number="3000" caption="Pounds of Food Donated" number_color="#ffffff" caption_color="#ffffff"][vcex_spacing][vcex_icon icon="fa fa-cutlery" float="center" color="#ffffff" custom_size="52px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vcex_milestone number="10000" caption="Trees Planted" number_color="#ffffff" caption_color="#ffffff"][vcex_spacing][vcex_icon icon="fa fa-tree" float="center" color="#ffffff" custom_size="52px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row="yes" css=".vc_custom_1456097558482{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_heading text="#E-8_R28lMjAlM0NzcGFuJTIwc3R5bGUlM0QlMjJjb2xvciUzQSUyMzljYzkwMCUyMiUzRUdyZWVuJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUyMCUyNmFtcCUzQiUyMFNhdmUlMjBvdXIlMjBQbGFuZXQ=" font_size="42px" line_height="1.2em"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text]You can also help protect our environment by living a more sustainable lifestyle and/or donating your time and money for the cause. We only get one planet so lets work together to take care of it![/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vcex_heading text="Keep in Touch"][vcex_spacing size="10px"][vc_column_text]Be sure to follow us via social media to keep up with the latest sustainable tips and news.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vcex_social_links style="flat-color-round" css_animation="left-to-right" twitter="https://twitter.com/WPExplorer" facebook="https://www.facebook.com/WPExplorerThemes/" googleplus="https://plus.google.com/+Wpexplorer/" css=".vc_custom_1456104457929{margin-right: 5px !important;margin-bottom: 5px !important;background-color: #8cc152 !important;}" size="14px" width="40px" height="40px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="23" img_size="400x400" alignment="center" css_animation="bottom-to-top"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

help 30 communities.[/vcex_pricing][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_pricing plan="Level 2" cost="$15" per_display="block" plan_background="#3bafda" plan_color="#ffffff" plan_size="21px" solid #e6e2d6" custom_button="" button_wrap_padding="20px" button_wrap_border="1px solid #e6e2d6"]With your donation we'll be able to plant 200 trees and help 40 communities.[/vcex_pricing][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_pricing plan="Level 3" cost="$30" per_display="block" plan_background="#f6bb42" plan_color="#ffffff" plan_size="21px" solid #e6e2d6" custom_button="" button_wrap_padding="20px" button_wrap_border="1px solid #e6e2d6"]With your donation we'll be able to plant 300 trees and help 50 communities.[/vcex_pricing][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1456099452917{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]Important: This is just an example demo of our Total template, we don't actually offer any "real" services and the donation buttons above are provided only as an example.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Protecting The Iguana In Costa Rica
item.dc:creator: totaltheme
item.content:encoded:
